doc.abstracts: This annual report reviews the International Finance Corporation's (IFC's) operations for the fiscal period July 1, 1994 through June 30, 1995. The report includes: 1) an analysis and description of the climate for private investment; 2) regional reports from sub-Saharan Africa, Asia, Central Asia, the Middle East and North Africa, Europe, and Latin America and the Caribbean; 3) a review of the role of the environment in IFC operations; 4) a financial review; 5) the IFC portfolio; 6) management and organization decriptions; 7) financial statements; 8) the investment portfolio; and 9) a statement of cumulative commitments.
